title: Life just got better!
posting_body: Residents at Mount Vernon enjoy many exclusive amenities including our two sparkling swimming pools with relaxing sun decks, our state-of-the-art fitness center, clubhouse with free wi-fi, and much more.
Come experience Mount Vernon's charm and see why you should make our apartment community your next home today!
Swimming Pool with Sun Deck • Billiards Table in Clubhouse • State-of-the-Art Fitness Center with Free Weights • FREE WiFi in Clubhouse and Pool Area •

Relaxing Duck Pond • Park with Picnic Areas • Near Public Transportation • Monthly Resident Activities • Business Center • Clubhouse • Courtyard • Dog Park • Beautiful Views with Water Features • Conference Room • Yoga Area • Children's Play Room • Reserved Parking Available
• Outdoor Grill and Picnic Area • Online Payment Options • Off Street Parking •
On-Site Maintenance • Flexible Lease Terms • Spa/Hot Tub • Spanish Speaking Staff • Updater Moving Partner Amenities
Spacious 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom Floor Plans • Private Patios and/or Balconies* •
• Fully Equipped Kitchens • Granite Counter Tops • New G.E. Black Appliances • Shaker Style Expresso Cabinets •
Brushed Nickel Lighting/Fixtures • USB Charging Stations •
Cable Ready • Carpeting • Hardwood Style Flooring • Dishwasher • Electronic Thermostat • High Ceilings • Washer/Dryer Connections
